ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Psycasts expanded - Revert some nerf
ModMetaData.author: Mobivis
ModMetaData.description:
Reverting some changes that was nerf in the newest Vanilla Psycasts expanded updated. This was made for my personal usage but I'm just sharing it..
Current change:
NECROPATH - Resurrect psycast; 'Sacrificed' Finger revert to missing/gone fingers hediffs Which now allowed you to use serum or regrow limbs to regrow your missing fingers. - Paralysis pulse; Paralysis does not applies to the caster. Apply to Mechanoid again before pre-balanced update
Removed as I can't find the workaround. == CHRONOPATH; - Plant timeskip; Revert Plant timeskip before nerf. ==
PROTECTOR; - Word of immunity Revert psycast before nerf. [Before 300%, Nerf 180% immunity gain]
Help?
